digest:
- *Efficient Edge LLMs Deployment* explores Hessian-Aware Quantization for edge AI, improving accuracy and latency. Read more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.07329
- *MASteer* framework enhances LLM trustworthiness through adaptive engineering, outperforming existing methods. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.06963
- *MQuant* introduces a quantization framework for multimodal LLMs, reducing latency by 30%. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2502.00425
- *Forecasting Commodity Price Shocks* uses LSTM and AI-extracted news for better prediction accuracy. Discover the details: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.06497
- *BadPromptFL* raises security concerns with a new backdoor attack on federated learning models. Find out more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.08040
- *ComPEFT* compresses PEFT models, achieving significant size reduction while enhancing performance. Explore further: https://arxiv.org/abs/2311.13171
- *UniSVG* dataset enhances vector graphic understanding in AI, improving SVG task capabilities. Read on: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.07766
- *GLiClass* improves sequence classification with zero-shot capabilities, adapting GLiNER for better accuracy. More information: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.07662
- *TeamMedAgents* integrates teamwork into LLMs for medical decision-making, showing improved performance. Check it out: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.08115
- *Dynamic Benchmark Construction* introduces CODE2BENCH for evaluating LLMs on code generation tasks. Learn more: https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.07180
